abstract: In this paper, we describe two programming assignments based on a refactoring of the classic Game of Life application. In particular, we use the Game of Life to help teach freshman students two important and widely applicable design patterns - Command and Visitor.

authors.name: Michael R. Wick
authors.affiliation: University of Wisconsin - Eau Claire, Eau Claire, WI

title: Using the game of life to introduce freshman students to the power and elegance of design patterns
